_header: Saint Leger a bishop was and holy man enough
Subjects: saints’ lives; Leger, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Leger in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn liger þat biscop was & holi mon Inouȝþoru
                    is prechinge monion to our lord he dronȝ…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou god uor loue of seynt liger is suete grace ous
                    sendeþat we after þisse lyue to þe Ioie of heuene
                    wende

Bod779.First Lines:
seint leger þe bysschop holy mon was I nowȝþorw his
                    preching mony on to oure lord he drowȝ…
Bod779.Last Lines:

                    sendeþat we alle to þe ioyȝe of heuin moot wende

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Leger a Bisschop was an holi mon also i nouhMoni mon
                    þorwȝ his prechinge to vr lordus lawe he drouh…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now God for þe loue of seint Leger his swete grace vs
                    sendeÞat we aftur þisse lyue to þulke ioye mote wende.
                    Amen.
